text: Cecil frowned in disappointment as he focussed upon the printing to find no Govr. no Compa., in fact no five pound notes at all. He was holding a paper booklet, the top sheet of which bore, in large Baskerville type, the words METROPOLITAN He ruffled the sheets irritably and glowered at his own breach of social morality.
